prompt:
Task: For each ingredient, choose the best Woolworths SKU (from candidates) and suggest how many retail packs are needed.
        Use servings + archetype context to keep quantities realistic. If no candidate fits, set selected_product_id to null and explain in package_notes.
        Do NOT rewrite the instructions or mention retailer names in the method; only provide product matches.

        Archetype snapshot:
        ```json
        {
  "uid": "arch_FAM_NorthAfrican_TagineCouscous",
  "name": "Family North African Tagine & Couscous Nights",
  "core_tags": {
    "DietaryRestrictions": [
      "None"
    ],
    "Audience": [
      "Family"
    ],
    "Cuisine": [
      "NorthAfrican"
    ],
    "PrepTime": [
      "30to60"
    ],
    "Complexity": [
      "Intermediate"
    ],
    "HeatSpice": [
      "Mild",
      "Medium"
    ],
    "Equipment": [
      "StoveTop",
      "Oven"
    ],
    "MealComponentPreference": [
      "FromScratch"
    ],
    "Allergens": [
      "None"
    ],
    "NutritionFocus": [
      "HighFiber"
    ]
  }
}
        ```

        Meal draft:
        ```json
        {
  "name": "Chicken, Apricot & Chickpea Tagine with Couscous",
  "description": "A family-friendly North African braise of chicken, sweet apricots, and chickpeas, finished with preserved lemon and herbs, served over fluffy couscous.",
  "servings": "Serves 4–6",
  "prep_steps": [
    "Preheat oven to 180°C/350°F.",
    "Slice 2 onions and mince 3 garlic cloves.",
    "Peel and cut 3 carrots into chunky rounds.",
    "Rinse and drain 2 cups cooked chickpeas if using canned.",
    "Chop 6 apricots and finely chop the rind of 1 preserved lemon.",
    "Roughly chop a small handful of parsley.",
    "Pat dry 1 kg chicken thighs; season all sides with 1.5 tsp salt and 1 tsp black pepper.",
    "In a jug, whisk 1 cup passata with 1.5 cups chicken stock and 1 tbsp tomato paste."
  ],
  "cook_steps": [
    "Heat 2 tbsp olive oil in a large oven-safe pot over medium-high heat.",
    "Brown chicken thighs in batches, 3–4 minutes per side; set aside.",
    "Lower heat to medium. Add onions and a pinch of salt; cook 5 minutes until translucent.",
    "Stir in garlic, 1 tsp cumin, 1 tsp coriander, 1 tsp paprika, 1/2 tsp cinnamon, 1/2 tsp turmeric powder; cook 30 seconds until fragrant.",
    "Add carrots, chickpeas, apricots, preserved lemon, and 1 bay leaf; toss to coat.",
    "Return chicken and any juices to the pot. Pour in the passata-stock mixture. Bring to a simmer.",
    "Cover and transfer to the oven; bake 25–30 minutes until chicken is tender and sauce slightly thickened.",
    "While the tagine finishes, put 2 cups couscous in a bowl. Bring 2 cups vegetable stock to a boil; pour over couscous, cover, and rest 5 minutes. Fluff with a fork.",
    "Taste the tagine; adjust salt and black pepper to preference. Remove bay leaf.",
    "Sprinkle with chopped parsley and serve the tagine over couscous."
  ],
  "ingredients": [
    {
      "core_item_name": "chicken thighs",
      "quantity": "1 kg",
      "preparation": "patted dry, seasoned"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "olive oil",
      "quantity": "2 tbsp"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "onions",
      "quantity": "2 large",
      "preparation": "sliced"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "garlic",
      "quantity": "3 cloves",
      "preparation": "minced"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "carrots",
      "quantity": "3 medium",
      "preparation": "cut into chunky rounds"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "chickpeas",
      "quantity": "2 cups cooked",
      "preparation": "rinsed and drained if canned"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "apricot",
      "quantity": "6",
      "preparation": "chopped"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "preserved lemon",
      "quantity": "1",
      "preparation": "rind finely chopped"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "passata",
      "quantity": "1 cup"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "chicken stock",
      "quantity": "1.5 cups"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "tomato paste",
      "quantity": "1 tbsp"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "cumin",
      "quantity": "1 tsp"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "coriander",
      "quantity": "1 tsp"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "paprika",
      "quantity": "1 tsp"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "cinnamon",
      "quantity": "1/2 tsp"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "turmeric powder",
      "quantity": "1/2 tsp"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "bay leaves",
      "quantity": "1"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "salt",
      "quantity": "to taste"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "black pepper",
      "quantity": "to taste"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "parsley",
      "quantity": "small handful",
      "preparation": "chopped"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "couscous",
      "quantity": "2 cups dry"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "vegetable stock",
      "quantity": "2 cups",
      "preparation": "boiling hot"
    }
  ],
  "meal_tags": {
    "DietaryRestrictions": [
      "None"
    ],
    "Audience": [
      "Family"
    ],
    "Cuisine": [
      "MiddleEastern",
      "NorthAfrican"
    ],
    "PrepTime": [
      "30to60"
    ],
    "Complexity": [
      "Intermediate"
    ],
    "HeatSpice": [
      "Mild"
    ],
    "Allergens": [
      "None"
    ],
    "NutritionFocus": [
      "HighFiber"
    ],
    "Equipment": [
      "Oven",
      "StoveTop"
    ],
    "MealComponentPreference": [
      "FromScratch",
      "SemiPrepared"
    ]
  }
}
        ```
